name: Luckmaker - GMTKJam 2022
description:
You are a dice, you have just been rolled and your one and only job is to help your player get the number they desire, what they don't know is that the table is a battleground, you are a soldier, and the forces of randomness that permeate the universe are your enemy, they graveyard dice rise again, don't let them draw to close lest they drain the luck from your knucklebones and turn you into a husk like them, hunting down those dice who yet still battle on.

Goal:

Destroy all the dice husks that seek to steal your luck, keep them at a distance as just their presence nearby will drain you dry, run out of luck and you're done. Destroying dice will return a bit 'o luck back to you, the more luck you have at the end the better the roll your player receives, can you score that ever elusive Nat20?

Controls:

Move using WASD, Jump using Spacebar

Aim using the mouse, the character will look toward the cursor

Hold the left mouse button to shoot

Hold the right mouse button to rotate the camera

You can only attack while stationary, your weapon is determined randomly as you roll, and ammo is limited. Refresh your ammo and change weapons by moving.

You can see your current "Luck" (health) in the bottom left corner of the screen, it is the yellow bar, there you will also see the currently swapped to weapon and amount of remaining ammo you have in the clip.

Weapons/Abilities:

1. Pip-Blast: A short range, rapid, shotgun-like blast utilizing the pips of lost dice to damage and knockback enemies

2. Poker Chip Glaive: Throw two poker chips and call their bluff as your chips ricochet through scores of enemies leaving all stunned in their wake

3. Sorry About The Mines: Toss a bundle of colorful mines out across the board and halt your enemies in their tracks, and should they dare to step onto your side of the table, the next thing they know they'll be crashlanding back at square 1.
